Marketplace Disciples

Interviews with Christian leaders in business

Hi, my name is Michael.

For the past several months I have been working on this new project — interviewing Christians who are leaders in the business world. These are people who work for themselves or own small businesses, but most importantly, they love the Lord.

I talk to them about what they do, and dig deep to understand how their faith motivates them and radically changes how they approach their work.

I started these interviews a few months ago because I want to encourage Christians who are faithfully serving the Lord in the marketplace. The conversation around how faith and business can come together to serve God's kingdom isn't one that often comes up, and I want to help push that conversation forward.

My desire is that through these interviews you will find ideas, inspiration, and encouragement.

I am still working on getting the initial interviews and website together, but if you're excited about this please sign up below and be the first to know when Marketplace Disciples launches!

michael@marketplacedisciples.com
